page.title: 03PENSBY AT LEISURE
page.content: Results of a leisure survey completed by people aged 30-50 in the Pensby area. 1.{Favourite leisure}activities: Gardening 18% Knitting 7% Hobbies 13% Walking 8% Sport 26% Others 10% Reading 18% 2.{Where the leisure activites take {place:} Home In Pensby Out of Pensby 56% 7% 37% 3.{What leisure facility would people {most like built in Pensby:} Bowling Alley 7% Ice Rink 14% Swimming Pool 79% The results show that the majority of people surveyed spend most of their time on leisure activities at home or have to travel outside Pensby to find certain sporting facilities.
